newsitem.title: USA: Shelter Components in talks to buy firm.
newsitem.headline: Shelter Components in talks to buy firm.

text.p: Shelter Components Corp said Friday it is in final negotiations to purchase the operations and net assets of Plastic Solutions Inc (PSI), of South Bend, Ind.
PSI, which had 1996 sales were approximately $8 million, makes injection molded products primarily for the sporting goods, automotive, and medical equipment industries.
Shelter said it expects to grow significantly the PSI business by manufacturing numerous products for the manufactured housing and recreational vehicle industries.
The transaction, which is expected to close on or about June 30, 1997, will include cash and notes payable to the sellers.
Shelter also said it continues to evaluate numerous other growth opportunities.

Shelter distributes products used principally in the production of manufactured housing, modular housing and recreational vehicles. In addition, the company thermoforms plastic bath products and laminates decorative wallboard primarily for these markets.
